        java.lang.Object refreshPage()
        Posts the page to server
        Returns:

      • goToEntryPoint

        java.lang.Object goToEntryPoint(java.lang.String entryPoint)
        Used instead of login: takes the user directly to the specified page.
        Parameters:
        entryPoint, - e.g. 'Dictionary'
        Returns:
        The current page after the refresh is done

      • goToEntryPoint

        java.lang.Object goToEntryPoint(java.lang.String entryPoint,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
        Used instead of login: takes the user directly to the specified page. This version takes the parameter list.
        Returns:
        The current page after the refresh is done
